channel.title: How do I make donator (only) wear?
channel.description: Well I have full santa and I want to make it only wearable for danators. How can I do that?? Note: I allready have donators (donatorrights = 1)

i think they shoud live without trade lol make them shops so they dont need trade lol i dont know how , but maybe use seartch bar?

item.title: How do I make donator (only) wear?
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:10, topic:274013”]Are you dumb?

0 - Normal
1 - Mod
2 - Admin

Those are on every server, so if he made it player rights 2+ which he’d have to do, they’d be able to do mod and admin commands… Think about it.[/quote]

dont tell me i"am dumb, if u think u can do it better post th good one i yust gave a sent. …

Those are on every server, so if he made it player rights 2+ which he’d have to do, they’d be able to do mod and admin commands… Think about it.[/quote]change it all to

&& playerRights >=2 && playerRights <=3

meaning you have to be in between admin and owner

item.title: How do I make donator (only) wear?
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

[code]}

        if (command.startsWith("givedonater") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yournamehere"))  {
            try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(4);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]
past this in your client.java . then step 2 is
make a number(rights for ur admin) and make they cannot drop so no-donaters canot take items sertch for the code thats looks like this

} public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) { // misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is // ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]"); boolean a = true; if (playerRights == 1) { sM("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead."); return ; }
change the playerrichts to the rights of donaters, next make they cannot trade. so have a look for this code

} if(other.playerRights == 1){ sM("You cannot trade this person."); return; } if(playerRights == 1){ sM("You cannot trade this person."); return; } again change the rights to the rights of the donaters
and if u want a shop for donaters make a teleport command to a space
where u put a shoper with the items if u wannt make yust do it like this

if(command.startsWith("donater") && playerRights >= nuberdonaterrights){ toX = coordshere; toY = coordshere; sM("donaterzone")
ok i hope this helped

Hope it helped
